question: You recently heard about some new jobs at a local department store. You would like to work there. Write a letter to store manager of the department store. In your letter-	Explain how you heard about the job-	Describe the kind of job you would like to have-	 Give details of your experience and qualificationsDear Sir or Madam,
text: I am writing a letter regarding the jobs which you have advertised in the local newspaper as I am haunting job column the I noticed that you have a lot of options. Furthermore, I would like to do the job in the department store as a store manager if you have that occupancy still available.

Moreover, I have 4 years of experience in that particular area in the ALDI stores since 2018 I was working there as a store manager and quality manager. It was always busy and pressurised work and I am keen to handle these kinds of stores. Unfortunately, I have moved from that area and it is very hard for me to continue that job because it is  far away from my current residence. I have done my qualifications in  hospitality management and  additionally, I have done my master's in  business administration.
Looking forward to from you soon
